title: VTuber Stream Highlight
description: Funny moments compilation with memes, subtitles, and zoom edits.
fullDescription: I will turn your 3-hour stream into a 10-minute engaging highlight video. Includes motion tracking subtitles, copyright-free BGM, sound effects, and meme overlays.

title: Stinger Transition
description: Custom animated transition with your logo and brand colors.
fullDescription: Smooth stinger transition in .WEBM format (transparent). Compatible with OBS and Streamlabs. Includes sound design.

title: CSS Chat Overlay
description: Highly customizable chat box for YouTube/Twitch streams.
fullDescription: Custom CSS code for Streamlabs/Streamelements. Features: Role specific colors, animations on new messages, and fully responsive design.

title: VTuber MV Production
description: High quality Music Video for Covers or Original Songs.
fullDescription: Full MV production including kinetic typography, visualizers, and particle effects suitable for your Lore. (Note: Illustration art must be provided by client).

title: Custom Stream BGM
description: Loopable background music for chatting or gaming.
fullDescription: Custom composed BGM tailored to your VTuber aesthetic. Genres: Lo-fi, Synthwave, Kawaii Future Bass, or Orchestral. You get full commercial rights.

title: Vertical Shorts / TikTok
description: Engaging portrait videos for TikTok, Reels, & YouTube Shorts.
fullDescription: Fast-paced editing designed for retention. Includes dynamic subtitles (Alex Hormozi style), sound effects, and motion graphics. Aspect ratio 9:16.

title: EMD POP
fullDescription: Musik dengan genre EDM yang mungkin cocok dengan karakter atau lore kamu

title: ROYAL GOTHIC
fullDescription: Bawa kemegahan istana kuno ke dalam stream kamu dengan Royal Gothic Live Chat. Overlay premium dengan animasi partikel magis, efek fog dinamis, dan sistem identitas role yang mewah.
